Text.Page: As requested by Stefanna, you delivered tanning oil to a Castanic who is tanning.

Hello there, . Are you enjoying some fun in the sun?

Unfortunately, I can't relax, myself. I've fallen behind in my delivery orders, and I can't take a break until everyone has their tanning oil.

I don't suppose you could help me with that...?

Thank you so much, ! Now let's see...

I have four different clients waiting for tanning oil, but this one's been waiting the longest. Here. Could you take this bottle of tanning oil to her?
You aren't Stefanna. That's...disappointing. Did she say anything about me?
It's about time! I was starting to smolder!
What took you so long? Oh, I see: Stefanna's relaxing on the beach while you run her errands. Typical.
Ah, Stefanna's tanning oil, at last! Have you tried it? You simply must! It's the absolute best!

Thank you so much, ! It's just too hot out to be making deliveries. You should take a break.

Here, put this onâ€”it'll keep the sun out of your eyes.
